import React,{ useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' export const CreateActivity = ()=>{ let $countries = useSelector((state)=>state.countries) let [act, setAct] = useState({ name:'', difficulty:'', duration:'', season:'', countries:[] }) let handleChange = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setAct({ name:'', difficulty:'', duration:'', season:'', countries:[] }) } return( <>
Activity create











{$countries.map((el)=>
{el.id}
)}



) }
